name: DodgeBombs
description: DodgeBombs is a little game where you have to try not to get hit by one of the many bombs that appear and try to beat your own highscore, it is mean to be play in small sessions, it is like having a mobile game but in you PC, for example, if you are working on a project and you stress out, you can play for 5 minutes this game en relax a bit.
